verses.verse: Concerning the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5984><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Hath <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons?<s%> hath he <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3423>heir?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> then doth their <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in his <S%H5892>cities?<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will cause an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121>Ammonites;<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H8510>heap,<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> then shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H3423>heir<s%> unto them that <S%H853>were<s%> his <S%H3423>heirs,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Howl, <S%H3213><s%> O <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> <S%H6817>cry,<s%> ye <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> <S%H2296>gird<s%> you with <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> <S%H5594>lament,<s%> and run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> by the <S%H1448>hedges;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> <S%H1984>gloriest<s%> thou in the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> thy <S%H2100>flowing<s%> <S%H6010>valley,<s%> O <S%H7728>backsliding<s%> <S%H1323>daughter?<s%> that <S%H982>trusted<s%> in her <S%H214>treasures,<s%> saying, <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me?

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> those that be <S%H5439>about<s%> thee; and ye shall be driven <S%H5080>out<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> right <S%H6440>forth;<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall gather <S%H6908>up<s%> him that <S%H5074>wandereth.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Concerning <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> Is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in <S%H8487>Teman?<s%> is <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H6>perished<s%> from the <S%H4480>prudent?<s%> <S%H995><s%> is their <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5628>vanished?<s%>

Flee <S%H5127><s%> ye, turn <S%H6437>back,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> him.

If <S%H518><s%> grape <S%H1219>gatherers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to thee, would they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7604>leave<s%> some gleaning <S%H5955>grapes?<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1590>thieves<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> they will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> till they have <S%H1767>enough.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2834>bare,<s%> I have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H853><s%> his secret <S%H4565>places,<s%> and he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to hide <S%H2247>himself:<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and his <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> and he is <S%H369>not.<s%>
Leave <S%H5800><s%> thy fatherless <S%H3490>children,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will preserve them <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and let thy <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> was <S%H369>not<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> have assuredly <S%H8354>drunken;<s%> <S%H8354><s%> and art <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> that shall altogether go <S%H5352>unpunished?<s%> <S%H5352><s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thou shalt surely <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8354><s%> of it.

For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by myself, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> a <S%H2721>waste,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>wastes.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8052>rumor<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> saying, Gather ye <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her, and rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

Thy <S%H8606>terribleness<s%> hath <S%H5377>deceived<s%> thee, and the <S%H2087>pride<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O thou that <S%H7931>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> that <S%H8610>holdest<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill:<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> thou shouldest make thy <S%H7064>nest<s%> as <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> I will bring thee <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Also <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation:<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5674>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> thereof.

As in the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> cities thereof, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> like a <S%H738>lion<s%> from the <S%H4480>swelling<s%> <S%H1347><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H386>strong:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> I will <S%H7280>suddenly<s%> make him run <S%H7323>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her: and <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H977>chosen<s%> man, that I may <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> her? <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is like <S%H3644>me?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H3259>appoint<s%> me the time? and <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H3289>taken<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and his <S%H4284>purposes,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2803>purposed<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8487>Teman:<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall draw them <S%H5498>out:<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> he shall make their <S%H5116>habitations<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> them.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7493>moved<s%> at the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of their <S%H5307>fall,<s%> at the <S%H6818>cry<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> thereof was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H1675>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H1224>Bozrah:<s%> and at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs.<s%>

Concerning <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> is <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and <S%H774>Arpad:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>tidings:<s%> they are <S%H4127>fainthearted;<s%> there is <S%H1674>sorrow<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> be <S%H8252>quiet.<s%>

Damascus <S%H1834><s%> is waxed <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and turneth <S%H6437>herself<s%> to <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H7374>fear<s%> hath <S%H2388>seized<s%> on her: <S%H6869>anguish<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> her, as a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>
How <S%H349><s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>left,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of my <S%H4885>joy!<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> her young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall be cut <S%H1826>off<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
And I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1130>Ben-hadad.<s%>

Concerning <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and concerning the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> ye, go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H7703>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Their <S%H168>tents<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> shall they take <S%H3947>away:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> to themselves their <S%H3407>curtains,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> them, <S%H4032>Fear<s%> is on every <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Flee, <S%H5127><s%> <S%H5110>get<s%> you far <S%H3966>off,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep,<s%> O ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath <S%H3289>taken<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and hath <S%H2803>conceived<s%> a <S%H4284>purpose<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> get you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7961>wealthy<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> without <S%H983>care,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1817>gates<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1280>bars,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone.<s%>

And their <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>booty,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil:<s%> and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> them that are in the <S%H7112>utmost<s%> <S%H6285>corners;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H343>calamity<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5676>sides<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> for <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H1369>might.<s%>

And <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> from the <S%H4480>four<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H7098>quarters<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them toward <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H7307>winds;<s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>

For I will <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%> to be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H5704>till<s%> I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them:

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and will <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
